page.title: 04TOURISM
page.content: Round the corner you will find the {BELMONT HOTEL}.They have 9 letting bedrooms and are open from May to early September.Their season gets shorter each year.They get a few casuals but most people come in the school holidays. My parents own{BEDRUTHAN HOUSE HOLIDAY {COMPLEX}.We have a cafe on the B 3726, a campsite and a hotel.The hotel has 5 bedrooms, 2 toilets and 2 bathrooms. It has a television lounge and a small bar.The guests'dining room seats 22 people but is usually half full.On Sunday the Restaurant does a popular Sunday lunch.During the Winter months my father decorates and tidies up the complex.he paints,builds extentions, gardens,does up the camp toilets, replaces broken or cracked tiles, plumbs and rewires and is always busy.
